bike.description: S-Works FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, team geometry, compact race design, 1.5" lower HS bearing, OS BB

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon, monocoque construction, OS race for 1.5" bearing, full carbon legs, crown and steerer
S-Works Campy style, 1-1/8" to 1.5" lower bearing, integrated threadless, sealed cartridge ceramic bearings w/ stainless steel races, 8mm carbon cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
S-Works FACT carbon, integrated oversize design
S-Works SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
